data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 19,650 believers in Uppsala that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uppsala, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Uppsala who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Uppsala, Sweden.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 171,407 cultural Christians in the state of Uppsala to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Uppsala.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Uppsala to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Uppsala.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Uppsala, Sweden to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
